name: Pending SO Items for Material Request
query:
SELECT 
	so.`name` AS "Sales Order ID:Link/Sales Order:120",  	 
	so_item.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	mr_sum.name AS "Material Request ID:Link/Material Request:120",
	so_item.qty AS "Sales Order Qty:Float:100 ",
	mr_sum.qty AS "Material Request Qty:Float:100"
FROM
	`tabSales Order` so 
 	LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order Item` AS so_item 
		ON so.`name` = so_item.`parent` 
 	LEFT JOIN (Select mr_item.qty, mr.name, mr_item.sales_order, mr_item.item_code 
		from  `tabMaterial Request` AS mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` AS mr_item 
		where mr.status != "Cancelled"
		AND mr.status != "Stopped" 
		AND  mr_item.parent = mr.name) AS mr_sum 
		ON so_item.item_code = mr_sum.item_code
		AND  so.`name` = mr_sum.sales_order
					 	
WHERE 
	so.docstatus = 1 
	AND so.status != "Closed"
	AND so.per_delivered < 100
	AND COALESCE(so_item.qty,0)> COALESCE(mr_sum.qty,0)  
GROUP BY so.name, so_item.item_code
ORDER BY so.name desc, so_item.item_code asc;
report_name: Pending SO Items for Material Request
